solution.text:
To receive \(10\) percent of the votes, i.e. \(0.1 \times _{{j*5000}}_=_{{j*500}}_\) votes, the central angle should be :
Central angle \(= \frac {_{{j*500}}_}{_{{j*5000}}_} \times 360 \)
\(=36\) degrees
We know that the central angle for kabaddi is \(36\). Therefore, kabaddi received \(10\) percent of the votes.

content.text: Which sport received \(10\) percent of the total \(_{{j*5000}}_\) votes?
